dmca.title: Please Reconsider the Chilling
dmca.body:
WTF, You chilled the real creator's website by chilling complaint claimed by the scammer？

In Chinese culture there is an old saying：a cunning villain who files a lawsuit first. This story goes exactly the same way.

This guy not only copied almost entire website including all contents but also make use of his website to cures me of defamation, libel and  slander. In this page http://www.fanyicn.net/bbs/read.php?tid-418.html the webmaster insults me with very bad words, published my private information, bank account, my girl friend's email and family address and phone number, all my person information he ever hacked into my PC and stoled.

Only publishing person's bank account number can be taken as serious criminal offense. I have several times applied for removal of this page ( deindexing the page ) via Google removal page, yet I got no a result.

Now things become more insufferable since Google can not identify a real criminal and allows the criminal to continue harm kind people
, to do evil to people.

I ever also reported this criminal website's purpose is to gather and organize hackers to hack google and other overseas internet, see here please:
http://fanyicn.net/bbs/hack/

But I am very sorry google ignored my report.


I also reported this is a fisher's website the webmaster intends to fish people's bank account via request user to fill in his bank account information to play a game. Please browse the homepage http://www.fanyicn.net/, see what will happen! a fishing page http://www.qq937.com/mhxx/tz/3370.html?cid=3370 would pop up. 
 

I ever also reported the webmaster Xiang Rong is a well-known hacker in China who can not only easily hack my PC as he ever did but also ever participated in Google gmail hacking team to hack google. This hacker graduated from Loyang Military Foreign Language College.

Now I herein apply for reconsidering the chilling to my website http://www.begray.com and chill the criminal website http://www.fanyicn.net.


Thanks

Yang Lee
yangzhou2130@gmail.com
